title: How to Make High Calorie Granola Bars

steps.headline: Spread oats on baking sheet and bake at 350' for 15-20 minutes to toast.
steps.description: They can bake longer at a lower temperature, or shorter at a higher temperature depending on your schedule. They should be a nice golden brown when finished.

steps.headline: Transfer the oats to large bowl.
steps.description: Add salt and any other chosen dry ingredients and mix to blend.

steps.headline: Combine wet ingredients in a smaller bowl, and mix until blended.
Add wet ingredients to dry ingredients and mix well.
Press mixture into greased jelly roll pan of appropriate size (see above).
steps.description: you can also line the pan with parchment paper instead.

steps.headline: Bake at 350ºF/180ºC for 20 minutes.
steps.description: Cool. Cut into bars. Store in refrigerator in sealed container.

text: Spread oats on baking sheet and bake at 350' for 15-20 minutes to toast. They can bake longer at a lower temperature, or shorter at a higher temperature depending on your schedule. They should be a nice golden brown when finished. Transfer the oats to large bowl. Add salt and any other chosen dry ingredients and mix to blend. Combine wet ingredients in a smaller bowl, and mix until blended.  Add wet ingredients to dry ingredients and mix well.  Press mixture into greased jelly roll pan of appropriate size (see above). you can also line the pan with parchment paper instead. Bake at 350ºF/180ºC for 20 minutes. Cool. Cut into bars. Store in refrigerator in sealed container. Finished.
sentences: Spread oats on baking sheet and bake at 350' for 15-20 minutes to toast.
They can bake longer at a lower temperature, or shorter at a higher temperature depending on your schedule.
They should be a nice golden brown when finished.
Transfer the oats to large bowl.
Add salt and any other chosen dry ingredients and mix to blend.
Combine wet ingredients in a smaller bowl, and mix until blended.
Add wet ingredients to dry ingredients and mix well.
Press mixture into greased jelly roll pan of appropriate size (see above).
you can also line the pan with parchment paper instead.
Store in refrigerator in sealed container.
